page.title: 03PEOPLE OF SPROATLEY VILLAGE
page.content: Most people have lived in the village between 0_5 years.Most houses are 8 or more years old.Most people travel out of the village to work.Most people travel to work in Hull.Most families possess a car.Most people are happy with the functions in the area.Most people have got relatives in the area. Most families have a history of living there.Most people think their children will live here.Nearly all the people have garages,gardens,televisions, freezers,washing machines and telephones and some families also have videos and double glazing. The people of Sproatley seem to like living in the village but from our questions we found that they would like a Chemist and also a special road crossing to help children cross the road as they walk from home to school.
